reviews:
LG has offered Standard Installation @ â‚¹999 . But charged 1299. They are saying that Rs300 for installing the L shape wall mount bracket for outdoor unit. I expected that this will  be covered as part of standard installation. we also need  to purchase additional wall mount bracket (L shape clamp) for installing out door unit . LG/AC company should provide complete accessories as normally outdoor unit required support for installing the same . They are providing the clamps for installing the indoor unit. For TV , technician  will provide wall mount bracket free of cost and free installation . we have have to  purchase AC plus wall mount bracket for outdoor unit. There are additional charges for standard installation and charges for fixing of wall mount bracket. It is making complication for customer. and giving opportunity to make lot of money who is installing the AC unit

AC is working properly for the last few months.

reviews: Extremely low noise level. The outdoor unit noise itself is lesser than indoor unit noise of few cheaper brands. Cools 120 square feet room within 2-3 mins in high cool mode.
The 4 in 1 feature let's you run the as at 40%,60%,80% and 100% efficiency level and there by provides fine grained control on electricity consumption.
Once the room is cooled one can run the ac in 40% mode itself unless the fan is on.
2020 model.
Does not have a heat pump though.

One of my best buy on Amazon. AC came directly from the factory did check the delivery location and Location printed on box. Extremely happy. It cools faster, no noise at all, fitting was done by professional LG team.
AC make was of Feb 2020. Packing was great and delivery was professional.
I've bought second LG air conditioner.
Really happy with its services, cooling, noise level and many more things.
Most important thing is it's cost more than average air conditioners but in the long run its saves more.
Very Good Energy EFFICIENT product , writing  review after 3 months of use ,
PROs

1.Delivery and installation process was good , no issues with LG team except that they are no great than local mechanics , indoor is installed slightly tilted towards right side , he says it's for water draining , LG must have given the slope inside the unit .
LG is giving rubber buffers for installation of out door unit , that's excellent , haven't seen this in recent time , even daikin is skipping this
2 . Best part of the product is it's silence , both outdoor and Indoor are remarkably silent ..
3. Very energy efficient
4 . Display Room temperature feature is good
5. Self diagnosis function is also good .
CONs

1. Filter and Aperture of filter is so small , I had to clean the filter every week to keep up the performance of the unit . I understand this feature filters very efficienctly and avoids choking of cooling coil but it may not be possible for everyone to clean the filter that frequently , LG have to rethink and reengineer on this front ..
2. Remote must have backlit display ,
It's virtually impossible to adjust in darkness , no backlit screen , no buttons which glow in dark .
I had to unlock my phone and use torch to change settings.
3 . Imprecise tempature control ,
If set at 25â„ƒ , it has to maintain at 25â„ƒ but this one overcools , if I check in room temp it's 22-23â„ƒ..
My 2008 LG 5star non inverter ac is very precise.
May be LG needs to work on inverter tech more....Or my unit has faulty sensors ..
4. QUALITY of plastics needs improve, although finishing is very good , sturdiness is missing , my filter cracked when I was refitting after a clean , fevikwik fixed though
One of the best value packed dual inverter AC in the market . It has good user friendly features and very minimalist design . Thanks for amazon delivery and LG services ðŸ‘
I brought the AC and its been 27days and already it has shut its operation showing up the error CH 05..
Amid the lockdown thereâ€™s no LG service working nor any help from the amazon side..
Its the worst experience amid lockdown..

very bad installion , all wall is damaged and get dirty by lg executive, 3 time install ac, fitting not done proper, , water is leaking and ac is not giving cold air, room temprature not dropping, when ask lg executive, he say, it will give only this cold, its summer now, it will work well when tempretaure is low,  why do somone buy ac in winter , such a pathetic ac, and so much worst service, very unprofessional people, and damaged my property and other appliances due to bad installion
I just bought a Lg dual inverter Ac. Its amazing product.
1 mobile diagnosis
2.low noise level
3.good customer service.
4.on day delivery
5.save more power efficiency.
6.we can operate ac using by mobile App
7.its show room temperature and digital display.
In this tome i have to say one nagetive thing customer service agent asked 2200 rupees for installation with stand.

product_name: LG 1 Ton 5 Star Inverter Split AC (Copper KS-Q12ENZA White)

stores.storeDescription: Split AC; 1 ton, Energy Rating: 5 Star, Warranty: 1 year on product, 10 years on condenser, 10 years on compressor, Dual inverter, 100 percent Copper with Ocean Black protection, Low refrigerant detection, Himalaya cool, High-grooved percent copper
reviews: I have bought this product 1 month back and the issue started from the very first day. This AC is not cooling the 11x10 room. Logged a case with LG and the support was pathetic.

3 Engineers visited my place and all of them said the same thing "Sir, AC technically ok hai" means panel temperature and Gas and current was ok...I have all screen capture with me and also the video where service engineer is convincing me to log a case with LG as this KS series is worst.

Lol Worst part is they have an option to see the Room Temp on remote itself and I am running AC on HC ( high Cooling - 16 Degree Cent ) and room temp is not going below 24 even though we ran it for 1-2 hr.
Place like pune where temp doesn't go more than 40 and if this AC isn't working there then I can think of the tropical place and North India.
I got conned as LG has no return policy or exchange policy in such case.
Buy it on your own risk!!
I didnâ€™t receive the fitting pipe for it and so I had to buy it on my own ,I want amazon to repay for it.
The air conditioner was good thou
Amazing machine..saw some reviews...wonder how people can be so dumb to set the room temp to 16 and expect it to cool to 16 degrees...machine is one of the best value for money machine.

Don't ever buy this AC.It stopped working before 1 year of buying itself.The service from LG is the worst and they are not even ready to cover it under warranty.Worst service!! Don't waste your money go for any other brands.
Return amount not credited to account
